properties.Land Slides: Landsliding of houses and lands - Wellagiriya
properties.Proposed Measures: This land is owned by the government. A reservation needs to be allocated and forest crops need to be planted.

properties.Land Slides: Irrigation canal overflowing to the houses - Marketplace of Gonakale
properties.Proposed Measures: Oluwawatta canal needs to be concrete lined.

properties.Land Slides: High water flow across the road during rainy days - Bangala Kadura road
properties.Proposed Measures: A culvert/ bridge need to be constructed. (L - 9 m, W - 1.8 m, T - 0.5 m, Opening L - 3 m, W - 0.9 m)

properties.Land Slides: 1. Wall collapsing near Ketayapathana Udagama Road
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a retaining/side wall (L - 10.5 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 3 m)

properties.Land Slides: 1. Landsliding a part of the road
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a side wall (L - 30 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 3.6 m)
Establishing a retaining wall (L - 8 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 1.8 m)

properties.Land Slides: 4. Soil erosion of the school land due to high flow of water from above lands
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a side wall at the middle of the school's land (L - 30 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 7.5 m)

properties.Land Slides: 5. Soil erosion of the school land
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a wall (L - 30 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 1.2 m)
Soil conservation practices need to be introduced to lands above.

properties.Land Slides: 1. Bank collapsing and bank erosion along 30 m of the canal - Danda Arawa canal
properties.Proposed Measures: A pipe needs to be applied from the anicut (D - 9", L - 200 m)

properties.Land Slides: 2. Erosion of the canal (20 m) - Danda Arawa canal
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a side wall (L - 20 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 3 m)
Trees need to be removed in a 3 m width area on both sides of the road.

properties.Land Slides: 2. Bank collapsing near the - Infront of the Wewathenna Nawarathna Stores
properties.Proposed Measures: Establishing a side/retaining wall earth filling (L - 6 m, W - 0.5 m, H - 9 m)
